## Disposables.polyfillDisposeSymbols() function

Polyfill for `Symbol.dispose` and `Symbol.asyncDispose` for Node.js versions prior to 20

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function polyfillDisposeSymbols(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void
